Code Descriptions
BIRLS displays the two codes referenced in the table below, which indicate whether or not VA has verified the SSN of a Veteran or a Veteranâ€™s spouse.
Verification Code
Description
Y
VA verified the SSN through computerized records-matching with SSA.
N
VA has not verified the SSN.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 2, Section C - Social Security Number (SSN) Verification
